title: I can't upgrade in Open Beta
body: So I've read through the 6.22 patch and apparently there is a new client coming out. I checked the FAQs link provided in the patch list on how to upgrade before the Legacy Client will forcefully be updated. Does anyone know where the prompt to upgrade to the new launcher is? It says it is there when you launch the game, but where is it, if it even is there.

replies.body: Hello, Im from EUNE and I cant upgrade it, I got the notification but its not glowing and I cant press ''Upgrade Now''

The open beta is currently only live on OCE.  As we get further into testing, I believe more regions will open up.  When that happens, your launcher will receive a notification to upgrade if you want.  You won't miss it!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ELJrNg61,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-11T17:52:17.809+0000)
>
> The open beta is currently only live on OCE.  As we get further into testing, I believe more regions will open up.  When that happens, your launcher will receive a notification to upgrade if you want.  You won't miss it!

Thanks very much, appreciated the reply :) .{{summoner:31}}
